scripts.test: rimraf dist && npm run build:ts && tsc -p test/tsconfig.test.json && cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true tap --ts test/**/*.test.ts
scripts.start: rimraf dist && npm run build:ts && fastify start -l info dist/app.js
scripts.dev: rimraf dist && tsc && concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "TypeScript,App" -c "yellow.bold,cyan.bold" "tsc -w" "fastify start --ignore-watch=.ts$ -w -l info -P dist/app.js"
